title: China implements another round of lockdowns, impacting major iPhone plant
content:
As the number of cases of COVID has been increasing in China, the local government is once again enforcing lockdowns in the country. This time, a new lockdown in the city of Zhengzhou puts the operations of the main iPhone plant at risk.

moreâ€¦

The post China implements another round of lockdowns, impacting major iPhone plant appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A new COVID-19 lockdown in the city of Zhengzhou, China, puts the operations of the main iPhone plant at risk.
